post.title: toshiba regza 42rv530u or sharp aquos lc46d64u?
post.content: which tv would you guys get? i currently have the regza 42" but it hasn't been a month yet so i can still return it. i bought it for $1179.99 plus taxes. through pm and a friend at staples, i can buy the sharp aquos lc46d64u for 1350 plus taxes. is it worth the switch?
